description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to improve the soundness of the banking sector by enhancing bank regulation, supervision and resolution capacity and by enhancing the development finance framework for Covid-19 affected enterprises.

International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

title.narrative: IRI 12 (FBiH): Citizen Engagement: % of Project-supported bylaws reflecting outcomes of consultations.
IRI 12 (RS): Citizen Engagement: % of Project-supported bylaws reflecting outcomes of consultations.
IRI 8 (FBiH): Number of recovery plans submitted and assessed in line with internal assessment methodology
IRI 8 (RS): Number of recovery plans submitted and assessed in line with internal assessment methodology
IRI 2 (FBiH):Bylaws adopted on (i) capital; (ii) liquidity; (iii) risk management standards; (iv) ICAAP; and (v) consolidated supervision
IRI 2 (RS): Bylaws adopted on (i) capital; (ii) liquidity; (iii) risk management standards; (iv) ICAAP; and (v) consolidated supervision
IRI 6 (FBiH): Bylaw on recovery plans adopted by FBA
IRI 6 (RS): Bylaw on recovery plans adopted by BARS

IRI 4 (FBiH): FBA (i) adopted a harmonized 2017 AQR framework; (ii) approved the final reports of AQRs of all banks in FBiH not previously subject to an AQR based on the harmonized 2017 AQR framework.
IRI 4 (RS): BARS (i) adopted a harmonized 2017 AQR framework; (ii) approved the final reports of AQRs of all banks in RS not previously subject to an AQR based on the harmonized 2017 AQR framework.

actual.value: Harmonized 2017 AQR framework adopted. AQRs completed.

title.narrative: IRI 1 (FBiH): Quantitative impact study on liquidity and capital regulations completed
IRI 1 (RS): Quantitative impact study on liquidity and capital regulations completed.
IRI 10 (RS): Adoption of a Government decree on a temporary partial credit guarantee scheme providing financing to COVID-19 affected enterprises

IRI 11 (FBiH): Gov't decision adopted detailing eligibility and pricing criteria, impl'n arrangements for the temporary partial credit guarantee scheme providing financing to Covid-19 affected enterpr

IRI 11 (RS): Gov't decision adopted detailing eligibility and pricing criteria, implement'n arrangements for the temporary partial credit guarantee scheme providing financing to Covid-19 affected ente
IRI 3 (FBiH): Adoption of new risk-based supervisory review and evaluation process (SREP) methodology aligned with with EU (European Banking Authority EBA) standards
IRI 3 (RS): Adoption of new risk based SREP methodology aligned with EU (EBA) standards
IRI 5 (FBiH): All undercapitalized banks have in place either mandatory time bound corrective action programs or resolution/liquidation programs
IRI 5 (RS): All undercapitalized banks have in place either mandatory time bound corrective action programs or resolution/liquidation programs
IRI 9 (FBiH): FBiH Government to approve a strategic statement for RBFBIH future development and adopt a draft new Law on Development Bank
IRI 9 (RS): Approval by the RS Government of a statement governing IRBRS’s future development.
PDI 1.a. (FBiH): All FBiH banks remain well-capitalized
PDI 1.a. (RS): All RS banks remain well-capitalized
PDI 2 (FBiH): FBA performing its legally mandated technical functions in bank resolution
PDI 2 (RS): BARS performs its legally mandated technical functions in bank resolution
PDI 3 (FBiH): Development finance f/w for Covid-19 affected enterprises enhanced.
PDI 3 (RS): Development finance framework for Covid-19 affected entrprises enhanced
PDI 1.b. (RS): BARS reviews and efficiently responds to cases when banks do not meet prudential norms for capital adequacy

actual.value: Yes. In line with the updated legal and regulatory framework, BARS performs its legally mandated function through either mandatingthe bank to have in place, and implement, a time bound corrective action program, or initiating the resolution process.

title.narrative: PDI 1.b. (FBiH): FBA reviews and efficiently responds to cases when banks do not meet prudential norms for capital adequacy

actual.value: Yes. In line with the updated legal and regulatory framework, FBA performs its legally mandated function through either mandatingthe bank to have in place, and implement, a time bound corrective action program, or initiating the resolution process.

title.narrative: IRI 7 (FBiH): Resolution unit in FBA established and made operational
IRI 7 (RS): Resolution unit in BARS established and made operational
IRI 3a (RS): BARS adopted the SREP operational procedure
IRI 3a (FBiH): FBA adopted the SREP Operational Procedures
